ComicInfo.Summary:
The Green Hornet and Kato have been pushed to the limit as they gave their all to protect the child from forces unlike any they have faced before. With the ground crumbling beneath them, will Green Hornet and Kato be able to make it out of this alive, or is this truly The End!?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Lee Weeks | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Marques | 2 | C/RE | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Anthony Marques | 3 | D/RE | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Lee Weeks | 4 | E/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Lee Weeks | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 Bonus FOC Incentive "Black & White Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Anthony Marques | 6 | G/LE | Limited Edition Premium "Black & White Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Lee Weeks | 7 |

ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Marques, Fernando Ruiz, J. Bone
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Marques, Fernando Ruiz, J. Bone
ComicInfo.Editor: Joseph Rybandt, Kevin Ketner, Matt Idelson
